query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZCST601 ( MANDT, CS601_YEAR, CS601_TYP, CS601_CRT, CS601_JAMT, CS601_TAMT, CS601_RAT, CS601_CNT_A, CS601_AMT_A, ERDAT, ERZZT, ERNAM ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT#, #CS601_YEAR#, #CS601_TYP#, #CS601_CRT#, #CS601_JAMT#, #CS601_TAMT#, #CS601_RAT#, #CS601_CNT_A#, #CS601_AMT_A#, HEX(CURRENT DATE), HEX(CURRENT TIME), #G_USER_ID# )
